name: Night Shift at Mama Dee's Chicken
name_original: Night Shift at Mama Dee's Chicken
description:
Controls are WASD and Left Mouse Button for action

Arcade game where every chicken you radiate comes back to haunt you and spread the radiation to other chickens. You may have some unwanted side effects the following day if you leave unbuttered chicken legs lying around as well....

Go for the highest score! (The leaderboards will be added, I did not have time to finish this feature for the jam, although the server is up, running and ready so check back for updates soon!)

Your actions determine what situation you will be in the next day until you are ultimately fired for the piece of trash you are!

Welcome to Mama Dee's and expect my sequel to be a cooking game that sucks worst than I do!

Created for the game jam: Jame Gam #25
